Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Ensures that staff in libraries are able to curate collections, services, and programming that reflect diverse interests
Summary: Ensures that staff in libraries are able to curate collections, services, and programming that reflect the interests of all people of the community that the library serves.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring that libraries have policies prohibiting the banning of books in order to receive state aid
